channel.title: Dueling error?
channel.description: So when someone tries to attack someone in a duel it dc's them and I get this message in the runeserver.bat: [code]Error with player 2, Sageofmali java.lang.NullPointerException at client.Attack(client.java:7149) at client.process(client.java:19624) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:273) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Game saved for player Sageofmali[/code]

item.title: Dueling error?
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Can you help me?

Read full topic

item.title: Dueling error?
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

sageofmali:

Like how? Before this you weren’t eben able to see the “Attack” option in the right-click menu. So I found a tut to add dueling to delta base. And this happens.

The error when you duel someone nulls yourself. Your dueling is glitched.

Read full topic

item.title: Dueling error?
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Couldn’t find anything in the client class, but found it in the playerhandler: if (players[i].playerName != null) misc.println("Error with player " + i + ", " + players[i].playerName); players[i].disconnected = true; e.printStackTrace(); } }

Read full topic

item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

Search for “Error with player” in your client.java

Read full topic

item.title: Dueling error?
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Here’s my attack method:[code] private boolean Attack() {
client AttackingOn2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn];
int EnemyX = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int EnemyY = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
if(hasKnife()){
sM(“Knives are disabled for now!”);
ResetAttack();
return false;
}
if(inDuel() && AttackingOn2.playerName != inDuelOpponent.playerName){
sM(“This is not your dueling partner”);
ResetAttack();
faceNPC(32768 + AttackingOn);
return false;
}
if(isInDuel() && AttackingOn2.playerName != isInDuelOpponent.playerName){
sM(“This is not your dueling partner”);
ResetAttack();
faceNPC(32768 + AttackingOn);
return false;
}
if(hitID != AttackingOn2.playerId && hitID != 0 && !multiCombat()){
sM(“I’m already under attack.”);
ResetAttack();
faceNPC(32768 + AttackingOn);
return false;
}
if (!(AttackingOn > 0)
|| !(AttackingOn < server.playerHandler.players.length)) {
ResetAttack();
return false;
}
if (playerId < 1) {
sM(“Error: Your player id is invalid. Please try again or logout and back in”);
}

[/code]

Read full topic
